column4: Rainofkayos:  doesnt citrix just use RDP ?... been a while since I messed with it
citrix does have an application that does RDP like a terminal server.. but they have many applications.. i need the web client to load a portal app
gotcha ... like I said its been a while ... last time I really used citrix was back in the nt4.0 days wiht metaframe ... and a little in 2000
